channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'SNL' castmember Bowen Yang shares a piece of 'cultural contraband' from his youth
item.description: Growing up with immigrant parents, first in Canada and then in the U.S., Yang was "obsessed" with pop culture and Saturday Night Live . Now he's up fo...

item.title: Ex-Israel military intelligence chief said 50,000 Gaza deaths "necessary"
item.description: Israeli ex-military intelligence chief said Gaza's high death toll is "necessary" to send a message to Palestinians

item.title: Jimmy Lai: Closing arguments in Hong Kong tycoon national security trial begin
item.description: Lai is accused of colluding with foreign forces under the controversial national security law, which Beijing imposed.

item.title: Hurricane Erin: No direct hit forecast for U.S., but flood risks prompt evacuations
item.description: Parts of North Carolina's Outer Banks are under mandatory evacuation orders, as the National Hurricane Center warns that Hurricane Erin could bring ta...

item.title: A Devastating Drought in Iran
item.description: A long lasting drought and severe heat this summer, compounded with government mismanagement of the country’s dams have led to an impending water cris...

item.title: California Democrats’ push for redistricting faces a tight legislative deadline
'No-one was expecting this': European leaders rush to US to help Ukraine avoid 'capitulation'
item.description: The heads of state hope to stop Trump from threatening long-term European security, writes James Landale.

item.title: Many U.S. jobs are falling further behind inflation, study finds
item.description: Incomes are still trailing inflation four years after the pandemic-era surge in prices, causing a financial pinch for many households.

item.title: BBC at Rafah crossing as queues of aid trucks wait to enter Gaza
item.description: The BBC's Chief International Correspondent Lyse Doucet is travelling with Palestinian Prime Minister Mohammad Mustafa and Egypt’s Foreign Minister Ba...

item.title: 7/14: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Trump gives Russia a 50-day deadline to make peace; Trump crowns Chelsea at FIFA Club World Cup final as FIFA opens office in Trump Tower

item.title: Hamas source says group agrees to latest Gaza ceasefire proposal
item.description: The proposal from regional mediators would see Israeli hostages released in two batches during a 60-day truce, according to a Palestinian official.

item.title: 8/18: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: Hurricane Erin could bring life-threatening surf to the East Coast. Also, why millennials are turning tough love into a trend.

item.title: Hurricane Erin forecast to create dangerous surf, high winds along US coast
item.description: Hurricane Erin is pelting parts of the Caribbean and is forecast to create dangerous surf and rip currents along the U.S. East Coast this week.

item.title: Air Canada union remains defiant after ordered to end strike on Monday
item.description: Canadian regulators once again ordered union leaders to end Air Canada's work stoppage on Monday, while employees remain defiant.

item.title: Trump meets with Zelenskyy, European leaders for Ukraine talks at White House
item.description: President Trump is hosting Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and European leaders at the White House on Monday. Follow live updates.

item.title: Key takeaways so far from Ukraine talks in Washington
item.description: Ukraine's President Zelensky managed to avoid another disastrous Oval Office meeting with Donald Trump.

item.title: Texas Democrats say they’re ending a two-week walkout over gerrymandered US House map plan
What to know as Air Canada strike continues
item.description: Air Canada advises passengers not to go to the airport unless they have tickets on other airlines.
